Title: Famous people, famous words -- Sun Zhongshan (Sun Yat-sen)
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances. Sun Zhongshan (孙中山, 1866-1925), also known as Sun Yat-sen, Sun Yixian and Sun Wen, is considered the founding father of modern China, both in the People’s Republic and in the Republic of China (on Taiwan).This quote from Sun reads: "What is the biggest thing about being a human being? Is to know how to be patriotic" (做人最大的事情是什么呢？就是要知道怎样爱国).
